argument_blocks.comment: Variable name like 'box1' in the Boxes palette or action name like 'action' in the Action palette
Number expression like '1 / 4' in the Number palette or boolean expressions like 'box1 >= 0' in the Boolean palette
Logical expressions like 'a && b' or 'a || b' in the Boolean palette
Unary expressions such as ! in boolean palette or - in number palette
Literals such as numbers or booleans or strings
Math operators such as absolute value or square
Math utility operators such as distance or random

body_blocks.name: storein2
body_blocks.comment: Variable assignment in the Boxes palette like 'var box1 = 2 * 5;'

body_blocks.name: storein
body_blocks.comment: Store in block using mouse.setBox(name, value)

body_blocks.name: decrementOne
body_blocks.comment: Decrement by one block in the Boxes palette 'box1 = box1 - 1;'

body_blocks.name: increment
body_blocks.comment: Increment block in the Boxes palette 'box1 = box1 + 3;'

body_blocks.name: tie
body_blocks.comment: Tie block in the Rhythm palette

body_blocks.name: newswing2
body_blocks.comment: Swing block in the Rhythm palette

body_blocks.name: nameddoArg
body_blocks.comment: Action palette, async block with arguments

body_blocks.name: start
body_blocks.comment: Start block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: action
body_blocks.comment: Action block in the Action palette

body_blocks.name: repeat
body_blocks.comment: Repeat block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: forever
body_blocks.comment: Forever block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: while
body_blocks.comment: While block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: until
body_blocks.comment: Do While block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: switch
body_blocks.comment: Switch block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: defaultcase
body_blocks.comment: Default case block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: case
body_blocks.comment: Case block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: break
body_blocks.comment: Break block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: if
body_blocks.comment: Basic if block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: ifthenelse
body_blocks.comment: If-then-else block in the Flow palette

body_blocks.name: setDict
body_blocks.comment: Set value block for dictionary, with specific dictionary

body_blocks.name: meter
body_blocks.comment: Set meter block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: pickup
body_blocks.comment: PICKUP block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: setbpm3
body_blocks.comment: Set BPM block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: setmasterbpm2
body_blocks.comment: Set master BPM block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: everybeatdo
body_blocks.comment: On every note do block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: everybeatdonew
body_blocks.comment: On every beat do block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: onbeatdo
body_blocks.comment: On strong beat do block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: offbeatdo
body_blocks.comment: On weak beat do block from the meter palette

body_blocks.name: drift
body_blocks.comment: No clock block from the meter palette
Flow blocks with one number argument
